title: Harvest Market Juice Bar and Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Juice bar window in the back of the natural food store. Offers a light food menu plus some pre-made packaged foods for takeaway. You could buy the food and sit outside in the yard at the front of the shopping plaza. This store had previously operated as Papaya Health Foods (prior to summer 2011).
